get_release_names.command: helm -n {namespace} ls -a | grep caf | egrep -v assistant

af_main.command: helm get all {releaseName} -n {namespace}  | grep -w passiveMain -A 1 | tail -n 1

af_passive.command: helm get all {releaseName}-passive -n {namespace} | grep -w passiveMain -A 1 | tail -n 1

pod_status.command: kubectl get pod -n {namespace} | grep caf | grep -v assistant
